full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Overview
A contract worth up to 7 years has been awarded to [contractor name] after an advanced contract award notice (ACAN) was issued to the supplier community. The contract is for the rental of an outdoor firing range facility for the training of Border Services Officers (BSO) firearms.

### Technical Summary

* **Contract Details**: The contracting agency is the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) and the contract was awarded on [date].
* **Services Provided**: The contractor will provide a firearms range facility rental service for the BSO firearm training.
* **Contract Period**: The contract will run from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2029, with an option to extend for four additional years.

### Proposal Submission

Suppliers who believe they are fully qualified and able to meet the contract requirements may submit a statement of capabilities to Lynn Kalp at Lynn.Kalp@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca on or before the closing date and time. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

### Contact Information

* **Contact**: Lynn Kalp
* **Email**: Lynn.Kalp@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: Not Available
* **Fax**: Not Available

### Supporting Documents

The following documents are available for review:
